stories.headline: Deadly Practice? Cosmetic Surgery
stories.summary: An investigation into malpractice in cosmetic surgery offices in Florida, with a focus on poorly trained doctors performing lengthy operations and the resulting fatalities.

stories.headline: Legal Drug Hazards Inside the FDA
stories.summary: The article is based on a personal investigation into the pharmaceutical industry, uncovering the inner workings of the FDA and exposing the dangers of legal drugs.

stories.headline: Naming the Unknown
stories.summary: Sampley's investigation led to the exhumation and identification of the Vietnam-era Unknown Soldier using military databases, revealing him to be Lt. Michael Joseph Blassie.

stories.headline: Counting Crime Right
stories.author_name: Mark Fazlollah, Craig R. McCoy, Michael Matza
stories.summary: Highlights how Philadelphia police underreported crimes to present a safer image, with revelations leading to accurate crime statistics and public acknowledgment.

stories.headline: Digging up Submarines
stories.summary: Focuses on using data and personal interviews to uncover the secretive history of submarine espionage during the Cold War.
